patthana17.11:4.1: Abyākataṃ parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.11:5.1: Kusalaṃ mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.11:5.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana17.11:6.1: Kusalaṃ appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.11:6.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
